name: KnightMoveMove
description:
A Puzzle Game that has inspiration from "Helltaker" made by Thai students from Debsirin School M.5/8 this game was made for the Computer Project subject.

This is our first time making a game and the first time using unity so it might have some bugs in this game.

If there is a bug or things need to be improved, feel free to tell us at "phonlakritc@gmail.com" or "i.deepaung@gmail.com" We hope you enjoy our game.

Story

It's the story of a skeleton being resurrected and given the mission from a saint to find the Elixir and give it to him so that he can become human again.
